text: @DrRPNishank @narendramodi @AmitShah @cbseindia29 @DrRPNishank @narendramodi @AmitShah sir what about NEET exam please we r also students n corona virus is dangerous for us also please postpone NEET exam and announce ur decision fast we can't risk our lives and we can't wait anymore #HealthOverNEETjee #postponeneet #Coronavirus
